duties_responsibilities.duty: Visit Medicaid members in their homes, Assisted Living Facilities, and/or Long Term Care Facilities and other care settings – 75-90% local travel
Assess and evaluate member's needs and requirements to establish a member-specific care plan
Ensure members receive services in the least restrictive setting for optimal well-being
Plan and implement interventions to meet member needs
Coordinate services and monitor & evaluate the case management plan against member's personal goals
Guide members/families toward resources appropriate for their care

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in social work, sociology, psychology, gerontology, or related social services field, or registered nurse licensed to practice in the State
